pr_title: Add anchor links for section headers

timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: No, there is a specific style for a.headerlink:hover in the included haiku.css (comes from the theme so no easy way to change it ... need to clean all that up sometime)
replies.author: electrum

timeline.bodyText:
although both junit & jdbi use § for this, i kind of would expect #
anyway, they both show it on the left side of text (here it's on the right)
timeline.author: findepi
